## PhD Course

In addition to the symposium, we will offer a [PhD course on long memory processes](LM-PhD.qmd) as part of the [DGPE](https://econ.au.dk/dgpe). The course will be held at [Aalborg University](index.qmd) on November 26 and 27, 2024, right before the start of the Symposium.

All participants in the course are invited to attend the Symposium free of charge.

More details about the course and registration will be available soon.
